title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Emily Horne on National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan’s Call with Ibrahim Kalin, Spokesperson and Chief Advisor to the President of Turkey | The White House
content: National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan spoke by phone today with Dr. Ibrahim Kalin, Spokesperson and Chief Advisor to the President of Turkey.  They discussed their shared commitment to supporting Ukraine in the face of Russian aggression and the importance of a coordinated international response to the crisis.###
